domodlib('firstitems_config')
function onLogin(cid)
if getCreatureName(cid) == "Account Manager" then doSetCreatureOutfit(cid, {lookType = 655}, -1) return true end
if getPlayerSlotItem(cid, CONST_SLOT_ARMOR).itemid > 0 then return true end
for _, id in ipairs(config.items) do doPlayerAddItem(cid, id, 1) end local bag = getPlayerItemById(cid, false, 1988).uid doAddContainerItem(bag, 12267, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12266, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12264, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12265, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12263, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12262, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12261, 1) doAddContainerItem(bag, 12260, 1)
return true end
